body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. have at least 5 mana available
2. wait for the opponent to cast a spell
3. cast Spell Contortion
4. read the notification: "Spell Contortion - Counter target spell (spell name) unless its controller pays {2}. player name draws 0 cards." What is the expected output? What do you see instead? expecting to be prompted to pay the kicker cost to draw 1 or more cards What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
